head: Dividend Growth
subhead: Looking for at least 5% annual dividend growth.

head: Dividend Chowder
subhead: A growing dividend = rising income and often signals financial health.

head: Dividend Yield
subhead: Buy when the yield is high vs. historical average.

head: DCF/DDM Value
subhead: Looking for a current share price at least 20 % below your blended DCF / DDM fair-value estimate.
